actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title IV of the Social Security Act to coordinate the penalty for the failure of a State to operate a State child support disbursement unit with the alternative penalty procedure for failures to meet data processing requirements.

summary.text: Child Support Penalty Fairness Act - Amends title IV Part D (Child Support and Establishment of Paternity) of the Social Security Act to prohibit the Secretary of Health and Human Services from disapproving a State plan for child and spousal support for noncompliance with Federal requirements for State disbursement unit operations as long as the State is receiving a penalty for noncompliance with Federal requirements for an automated data processing and information retrieval system.

titles.title: A bill to amend title IV of the Social Security Act to coordinate the penalty for the failure of a State to operate a State child support disbursement unit with the alternative penalty procedure for failures to meet data processing requirements.
